title: Santana trade good, bad for Tribe
subtitle: Santana trade good, bad for Tribe
body: CLEVELAND -- Just when the Indians finally had Johan Santana figured out, he leaves the league. Go figure. Yet even though the Tribe apparently had Santana's number in beating him an unprecedented five times in 2007, the club hardly views the two-time Cy Young Award winner's impending move to the Mets as a negative. Still, it is overwhelmingly clear that for Sabathia to remain in Cleveland, he'll have to be open-minded, when it comes to dollars and cents.          Anthony Castrovince is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Anthony Castrovince
